descriptive.title: MyFlyingBox Shipping
descriptive.subtitle: Multi-carrier shipping with LCE API
descriptive.description: Integrate MyFlyingBox shipping services with dynamic rate calculation, multi-carrier support, relay points, label generation and tracking.

descriptive.title: MyFlyingBox Livraison
descriptive.subtitle: Expedition multi-transporteurs via API LCE
descriptive.description: Integration des services de livraison MyFlyingBox avec calcul dynamique des tarifs, support multi-transporteurs, points relais, generation d'etiquettes et suivi des colis.
